Directions to IMF Headquarters


Headquarters:
International Monetary Fund
700 19th Street, N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20431

Telephone Operator: (202) 623-7000
Fax: (202) 623-4661

Map of IMF Headquarters and surrounding area

Business Hours and Holiday Schedule

Route

Metro | Train | Airport

Larger version
MapQuest View

Metro Directions

Orange Line
The nearest metro station on the Orange Line is Farragut West (about 3 blocks from the IMF). Exit at Farragut West Station via the 18th Street escalator. Walk west on I (EYE) Street one block to 19th Street. Go left (south) on 19th Street and continue across Pennsylvania Avenue. IMF headquarters has two buildings :HQ1 visitors' entrance is at 720 19th Street, NW. and HQ2 visitors' entrance is at the corner of 19th St and Pennsylvania Avenue.

From Foggy Bottom Station – walk south about 2 blocks down 23rd Street, NW. Turn left onto H Street, NW and go east to 19th Street, NW. IMF headquarters has two buildings :HQ1 visitors' entrance is at 720 19th Street, NW and HQ2 visitors' entrance is at the corner of 19th St and Pennsylvania Avenue.

Red Line
The nearest station on the Red Line is Farragut North (about 3-4 blocks away). Exit Farragut North Metro Station. Walk West for two blocks on K Street NW until you reach 19th Street, NW. Go left (south) on 19th Street and continue across Pennsylvania Avenue. IMF headquarters has two buildings: HQ1 visitors' entrance is at 720 19th Street, NW and HQ2 visitors' entrance is at the corner of 19th St and Pennsylvania Avenue.

For more information about the Washington, DC metro, see Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority.

 

Arriving by Amtrak

Most trains arriving to Washington, DC arrive at Union Station. To get to the IMF headquarters, either take a taxi or take the Red Line Metro from Union Station to Farragut North. From there, it is about 3 - 4 blocks to the IMF buildings. For more train information, see Amtrak.

 

Airports – Driving Directions

Dulles International Airport – IAD

  1. Follow signs for Washington, D.C.
  2. Continue on VA-267 (Dulles Access Road merges into VA 267) for about 16 miles
  3. Exit at I-66, heading towards Washington DC
  4. Exit at E Street, keep left
  5. Turn left on 18th Street, NW, and go Northwest for about 1000 feet
  6. Turn left on Pennsylvania Ave NW and go Northwest for about 500 feet
  7. Turn left on 19th Street, NW.
  8. IMF Headquarters are located at 700 19th Street NW (HQ1) and 1900 Pennsylvania (HQ2) - corner of Pennsylvania and 19th St

Reagan National Airport – DCA

  1. Follow signs for Washington, D.C. taking George Washington Parkway North
  2. Exit at US-50 W on the left forwards Memorial Bridge/Arlington Cemetery
  3. Keep left
  4. Merge onto Arlington Memorial Bridge
  5. Turn left on 23rd Street NW
  6. Turn right on H Street NW
  7. Turn right on 19th Street NW
  8. IMF Headquarters are located at 700 19th Street NW (HQ1) and 1900 Pennsylvania (HQ2) - corner of Pennsylvania and 19th St

Baltimore-Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport - BWI

  1. Follow Signs to I-95 West to Baltimore/Washington
  2. Take Exit 2B MD 295 South Baltimore/Washington Parkway
  3. Continue on MD-295, Baltimore Washington Parkway and go Southwest for about 24 miles
  4. Follow the Signs to Washington
  5. Merge onto US-50 West
  6. Stay straight to go onto New York Avenue, NW
  7. At 7th Street, MW, New York Avenue becomes Mount Vernon Place, NW
  8. Continue straight for 1 block, merge right onto Massachusetts Avenue
  9. Continue on Massachusetts Avenue to Thomas Circle
  10. Take Thomas circle around to M Street, NW
  11. Continue on M Street, NW to 19th Street NW
  12. Turn left onto 19th Street NW
  13. IMF Headquarters are located at 700 19th Street NW (HQ1) and 1900 Pennsylvania (HQ2) - corner of Pennsylvania and 19th St
